last_episode_to_air.name: The World Beater
last_episode_to_air.overview: A beautiful blonde gets the Saint into trouble at a crooked auto race.

name: The Saint
overview: Simon Templar is The Saint, a handsome, sophisticated, debonair, modern-day Robin Hood who recovers ill-gotten wealth and redistributes it to those in need.

episodes.name: The Talented Husband
episodes.overview: Simon encounters a man whose first two wives died mysteriously.

episodes.name: The Latin Touch
episodes.overview: Simon attempts to rescue a kidnapped girl.

episodes.name: The Careful Terrorist
episodes.overview: Simon is marked for death by a Union boss.

episodes.name: The Covetous Headsman
episodes.overview: A girl going to see her brother discovers him murdered.

episodes.name: The Loaded Tourist
episodes.overview: A tourist has a briefcase of something valuable.

episodes.name: The Pearls of Peace
episodes.overview: Simon lends a friend $3000 to search for lost pearls.

episodes.name: The Arrow of God
episodes.overview: A columnist is found dead at a party where everyone has a motive.

episodes.name: The Element of Doubt
episodes.overview: A criminal lawyer never seems to lose a case.

episodes.name: The Effete Angler
episodes.overview: A fishing trip turns up an unexpected kind of fish.

episodes.name: The Golden Journey
episodes.overview: Simon takes a spoiled heiress on a 100 mile hike.

episodes.name: The Man Who Was Lucky
episodes.overview: A friend of the Saint's is threatened by a protection racket.

episodes.name: The Charitable Countess
episodes.overview: A gang of Italian street urchins rob charity balls.

episodes.name: The Fellow Traveller
episodes.overview: Simon investigates the death of an electronics engineer.

episodes.name: Starring the Saint
episodes.overview: A film is being planned based on The Saint's life.

episodes.name: Judith
episodes.overview: A drive in the country leads Simon to a case of fraud.

episodes.name: Teresa
episodes.overview: Simon helps a woman find her husband a circus performer.

episodes.name: The Elusive Ellshaw
episodes.overview: Someone is trying to kill a shipping magnate.

episodes.name: Marcia
episodes.overview: Simon assists an actress whose predecessor had committed suicide.

episodes.name: The Work of Art
episodes.overview: A girl's brother is accused of murdering an undercover agent.

episodes.name: Iris
episodes.overview: Simon must find the real blackmailer when the police suspect him.

episodes.name: The King of the Beggars
episodes.overview: Simon poses as a beggar to investigate a protection racket.

episodes.name: The Rough Diamonds
episodes.overview: The Saint is the prime suspect in a diamond robbery.

episodes.name: The Saint Plays with Fire
episodes.overview: Simon becomes involved with Nazi's in England.

episodes.name: The Well-Meaning Mayor
episodes.overview: A mayoral candidate dies in a small coastal town.

episodes.name: The Sporting Chance
episodes.overview: A scientist's daughter has been kidnapped to get him to defect.

episodes.name: The Bunco Artists
episodes.overview: Simon poses as a Texan to out con some con men.

episodes.name: The Benevolent Burglary
episodes.overview: Simon is falsely accused of stealing a piece of art after he bets the owner that he can steal it.

episodes.name: The Wonderful War
episodes.overview: The Saint comes to the aid of a Middle East oil magnate's son.

episodes.name: The Noble Sportsman
episodes.overview: Simon meets Lord Yearly and ends up fighting in a duel.

episodes.name: The Romantic Matron
episodes.overview: A young widow is attracted to a foreign agent.

episodes.name: Luella
episodes.overview: A friend of Simon's is blackmailed after he decides to have some fun while his wife is away.

episodes.name: The Lawless Lady
episodes.overview: Simon joins forces with a titled lady to avenge a friend's death.

episodes.name: The Good Medicine
episodes.overview: The Saint gives an unkind woman a taste of her own medicine.

episodes.name: The Invisible Millionaire
episodes.overview: A man seriously injured in an auto accident is very rich.

episodes.name: The High Fence
episodes.overview: Simon must match wits with a top London criminal after a date with a beautiful actress.

episodes.name: Sophia
episodes.overview: Simon deals with a bully who is threatening a small town.

episodes.name: The Gentle Ladies
episodes.overview: Three women are being blackmailed by an old acquaintance.

episodes.name: The Ever-Loving Spouse
episodes.overview: Simon meets a businessman who's being blackmailed.

episodes.name: The Saint Sees It Through
episodes.overview: Simon is called upon by the U.N. to investigate art smuggling.

episodes.name: The Miracle Tea Party
episodes.overview: Simon tries to discover who killed an agent.

episodes.name: Lida
episodes.overview: Simon comes to the aid of a girl who is being blackmailed.

episodes.name: Jeannine
episodes.overview: Simon becomes interested in an oriental diplomat's pearl necklace.

episodes.name: The Scorpion
episodes.overview: A criminal, known as The Scorpion, is blackmailing one of the Saint's friends and he goes to stop him.

episodes.name: The Revolution Racket
episodes.overview: A South American police Captain moonlights as an arms dealer.

episodes.name: The Saint Steps In
episodes.overview: A revolutionary new textile formula gets stolen.

episodes.name: The Loving Brothers
episodes.overview: In Australia, Simon helps an old prospector has just struck a fortune keep it away from his greedy sons.

episodes.name: The Man Who Liked Toys
episodes.overview: A friend of Simon's thinks her boss is being blackmailed.

episodes.name: The Death Penalty
episodes.overview: The Saint uncovers a vicious vice ring in Southern France.

episodes.name: The Imprudent Politician
episodes.overview: The wife of an indiscreet politician asks Simon for help.

episodes.name: The Hi-Jackers
episodes.overview: Simon meets an old friend in Munich.

episodes.name: The Unkind Philanthropist
episodes.overview: The Saint comes to the aid of a Puerto Rican farmer.

episodes.name: The Damsel in Distress
episodes.overview: Simon helps a family who owns a London Restaurant

episodes.name: The Contract
episodes.overview: An American airman is seeking revenge against The Saint.

episodes.name: The Set-Up
episodes.overview: Simon and a young starlet go after a gangster.

episodes.name: The Rhine Maiden
episodes.overview: Simon helps a woman chase down bank robbers.

episodes.name: The Inescapable Word
episodes.overview: Death rays seem to be coming from a Scottish research center.

episodes.name: The Sign of the Claw
episodes.overview: The Saint confronts a terrorist gang in the South East Asian jungles.

episodes.name: The Golden Frog
episodes.overview: A father and daughter con artist team tries to con the Saint.

episodes.name: The Frightened Inn-Keeper
episodes.overview: Simon finds he is unwelcome in Cornwall when he comes to the aid of a friend.

episodes.name: Sibao
episodes.overview: Simon encounters a young girl who is involved with voodoo.

episodes.name: The Crime of the Century
episodes.overview: Simon joins forces with, his old adversary, Inspector Teal to stop the crime of the century.

episodes.name: The Happy Suicide
episodes.overview: Simon becomes the guest on a TV talk show.

episodes.name: The Chequered Flag
episodes.overview: Simon encounters race car driver who has had lots of bad luck.

episodes.name: The Abductors
episodes.overview: Simon and an English girl become involved with a kidnapped scientist while in Paris.

episodes.name: The Crooked Ring
episodes.overview: Simon investigates a boxer's sudden rise in the ranks.

episodes.name: The Smart Detective
episodes.overview: Simon tests a security firm's claim that they are burglar proof.

episodes.name: The Persistent Parasites
episodes.overview: A rich man invites Simon and his 3 ex-wives to his French villa.

episodes.name: The Man Who Could Not Die
episodes.overview: A man is trapped underground with someone who wants to kill him.

episodes.name: The Saint Bids Diamonds
episodes.overview: The Saint poses as a diamond cutter to recover stolen diamonds.

episodes.name: The Spanish Cow
episodes.overview: Simon gets into trouble after preventing a theft.

episodes.name: The Old Treasure Story
episodes.overview: The Saint travels around the world in search of buried treasure.

episodes.name: The Queen's Ransom
episodes.overview: The Saint helps a disposed mid east ruler recover jewels needed to fund a counter coop.

episodes.name: Interlude in Venice
episodes.overview: The Saint gets involved in a gangsters revenge plot against a lawyer.

episodes.name: The Russian Prisoner
episodes.overview: A Russian Physicist wants to defect to the United States.

episodes.name: The Reluctant Revolution
episodes.overview: The Saint gets involved in a banana republic's revolution.

episodes.name: The Helpful Pirate
episodes.overview: A South American Dictator falls under the influence of a corrupt British scientist.

episodes.name: The Convenient Monster
episodes.overview: The Loch Ness Monster gets blamed for murders in Scotland.

episodes.name: The Angel's Eye
episodes.overview: In Amsterdam a respectable gem cutter denies ever seeing a diamond that was sent to him.

episodes.name: The Man Who Liked Lions
episodes.overview: Simon uncovers a strange cult that worships ancient Rome.

episodes.name: The Better Mousetrap
episodes.overview: It appears that Simon is involved in a Riviera jewel robbery.

episodes.name: Little Girl Lost
episodes.overview: Simon helps a girl who claims to be Hitler's daughter escape from Nazis.

episodes.name: Paper Chase
episodes.overview: A civil servant has defected with top secret files.

episodes.name: Locate and Destroy
episodes.overview: In South America, the Saint helps an Israeli agent capture a fugitive Nazi.

episodes.name: Flight Plan
episodes.overview: A nun in high heels has Simon involved with a VTOL plane theft that Simon has to learn to fly very quickly.

episodes.name: Escape Route
episodes.overview: Simon gets himself put in jail to infiltrate a gang specializing in jail breaks.

episodes.name: The Persistent Patriots
episodes.overview: Simon investigates an assignation attempt against the prime minister of a British colony.

episodes.name: The Fast Women
episodes.overview: Simon investigates murder attempt on female race car driver.

episodes.name: The Death Game
episodes.overview: Simon tries to stop an alliance between a crime ring and psychology students who plan murders.

episodes.name: The Art Collectors
episodes.overview: Simon meets several people who are after 3 lost Da Vinci's.

episodes.name: To Kill a Saint
episodes.overview: After an attempted assassination Simon tries to find out who has a contract out on him.

episodes.name: The Counterfeit Countess
episodes.overview: Simon is on the trail of counterfeit money.

episodes.name: Simon and Delilah
episodes.overview: A hated movie queen and her co-star are kidnapped.

episodes.name: Island of Chance
episodes.overview: Simon journeys to the West Indies to find the murderer of an old friend.

episodes.name: The Gadget Lovers
episodes.overview: Simon joins up with Russian agent in finding agent killer.

episodes.name: A Double in Diamonds
episodes.overview: Simon is led into a plot to steal a necklace while investigating the murder of a jeweler.

episodes.name: The Power Artists
episodes.overview: Simon gets framed for murder after a visit to an artist's studio.

episodes.name: When Spring Is Sprung
episodes.overview: A pretty girl lures Simon into a plot to free a Soviet spy, who is waiting trail in London.

episodes.name: The Gadic Collection
episodes.overview: The Gadic collection is the priceless centrepiece of an art exhibition at the Museum in Turkey, and several groups of people want it. Most notably, the wealthy art collector, Turin, who's certain the Saint's taken the collection. In an effort to obtain it for himself and discover its whereabouts, he imprisons Templar.

episodes.name: The Best Laid Schemes
episodes.overview: Simon investigates the drowning of sea captain.

episodes.name: Invitation to Danger
episodes.overview: Simon is taken prisoner by a beautiful blonde secret agent, who picks Simon up in a casino.

episodes.name: Legacy for the Saint
episodes.overview: The Saint masterminds a murder caper.

episodes.name: The Desperate Diplomat
episodes.overview: Simon tries to find a diplomat friend who disappeared with $1,000,000.

episodes.name: The Organisation Man
episodes.overview: Simon joins the ranks of a mercenary army in order to prevent a hijacking.

episodes.name: The Double Take
episodes.overview: Simon helps out a business man who claims he is being ruined by a perfect double.

episodes.name: The Time to Die
episodes.overview: Simon stalks an avenging killer bent on playing a clever game of cat-and-mouse with his pursuer.

episodes.name: The Master Plan
episodes.overview: The Saint tangles with dope smugglers.

episodes.name: The House on Dragon's Rock
episodes.overview: In Wales an experiment terrifies the local villagers.

episodes.name: The Scales of Justice
episodes.overview: The Saint investigates a series of convenient heart attacks.

episodes.name: The Fiction-Makers (1)
episodes.overview: Simon is mistaken for a mystery novelist, whom he is visiting, by a criminal gang who forces him to plot them a successful crime.

episodes.name: The Fiction-Makers (2)
episodes.overview: Simon is mistaken for a mystery novelist, whom he is visiting, by a criminal gang who forces him to plot them a successful crime.

episodes.name: The People Importers
episodes.overview: A smuggling ring deals in human cargo.

episodes.name: Where the Money Is
episodes.overview: Simon investigates the kidnapping of a producer's daughter.

episodes.name: Vendetta for the Saint (1)
episodes.overview: The Saint is put under pressure when he starts a vendetta against syndicate bosses.

episodes.name: Vendetta for the Saint (2)
episodes.overview: The Saint is put under pressure when he starts a vendetta against syndicate bosses.

episodes.name: The Ex-King of Diamonds
episodes.overview: An ex-king cheats at cards to regain his fortune.

episodes.name: The Man Who Gambled with Life
episodes.overview: Simon is selected to be frozen alive.

episodes.name: Portrait of Brenda
episodes.overview: The Saint investigates the murder of an old friend.

episodes.name: The World Beater
episodes.overview: A beautiful blonde gets the Saint into trouble at a crooked auto race.
